column4: I am in terminal.  After executing some python commands, my terminal starts displaying "funky characters" when I try to type.  I ctrl+d and I can begin typing letters again, but I cannot get back to my default command line.  This is a repeating problem.  Please advise.
type exit hit enter and relogin that's what I do when my terminal is messed up sometimes
I'm looking for a fix that doesnt require me to exit terminal
